heading: Accessibility Statement
statement:
We are committed to making our website accessible to all users, including people with disabilities.

This website has been adapted in accordance with the Israeli accessibility standard (IS 5568) and the international WCAG 2.0 Level AA guidelines. The accessibility features include:

- Text size adjustment
- Contrast mode toggle
- Readable font support
- Keyboard navigation

The website was tested and found accessible as of the date of this statement. We continue working to improve accessibility where possible.
